item.title: RubyTuesday add a quote by Charlaine Harris
item.description: "If there were an international butt competition, Eric would win, hands downâ€”or cheeks up." -- Charlaine Harris

item.title: RubyTuesday add a quote by Charlaine Harris
item.description: "Niall had been able to mask the odor of fairy from Eric in the restaurant, but I saw from the flare of Eric's nostrils that the intoxicating scent clung to me. Eric's eyes closed in ecstasy, and he actually licked his lips. I felt like a T-bone just out of reach of a hungry dog. "Snap out of it," I said. I wasn't in the mood. With a huge effort, Eric reigned himself in. "When you smell like that," he said, "I just wanna fuck you and bite you and rub myself all over you." -- Charlaine Harris

item.title: RubyTuesday add a quote by Charlaine Harris
item.description: "But there's a juicy artery in your groin," he said after a pause to regroup, his voice as slithery as a snake on a slide. "Don't you talk dirty," I told him. "I won't listen to that." -- Charlaine Harris

item.title: RubyTuesday add a quote by Charlaine Harris
item.description: "I drank lots of water and orange juice and took a multivitamin and iron supplement for breakfast, which was my regimen since Bill had come into my life and brought (along with love, adventure, and excitement) the constant threat of anemia." -- Charlaine Harris
